Title: Developer's Journey: Episode 4 | Matt Pocock
Author: Visual Studio Code
Description:
Join us on The Developer‚Äôs Journey, where we dive deep into the candid stories of software engineers navigating the highs and lows of their careers. From overcoming challenges to celebrating wins, this series offers an honest glimpse into the realities of life in tech.

In this episode, Matt Pocock shares his journey from voice coach to TypeScript educator and author of Total TypeScript and AI Hero with us. He reminds us that we have to bring our own hype and we have to communicate as well as we write code!

Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned developer or just starting out, these stories will inspire and resonate with you.
